channel.title: Sản phẩm – My WordPress
channel.description: Một trang web mới sử dụng WordPress

item.title: Flying Fish Bidon – 500ml
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description: Practical and chic 500ml bidon with signature Café du Cycliste Flying Fish detailing. The membrane lid can be opened or closed with one movement. In the open position, the bottle is always ready for use – squeeze to get exactly the right amount of water.
item.content:encoded:
All our bidons are BPA free, leakproof and eminently stylish. A necessity on any ride.

Product Detail:

  • screw on cap with membrane lid
  • lockable
  • bio bottle
  • made in europe

 

Care Instruction:

  • Dishwasher Safe

 

As our products are made from the highest quality materials special care will also guarantee a long life

item.title: White Classic Mona Superlight Audax Men’s Jersey
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description: The superlight Mona is a part of our Audax collection and built for high summer riding. The semi-mesh fabric provides exceptional ventilation and thermoregulation, aiding core temperature control in hotter weather and harder conditions. High wicking, fast drying and with consistent airflow, Mona is exceptionally effective when the mercury rises.
item.content:encoded:
Designed with longer distances in mind, Mona features our unique pocket configuration to increase loading capacity. Along with the classic three rear cargo pockets, the jersey has also been designed with a large mesh ‘drop’ pocket. Ideal for an additional base layer, warmer jacket or anything else needed when further is the order of the day.

The jersey has added reflectively for security when the light begins to fade out on the road, with an oversized panel positioned below the pockets and a reflective trim on both shoulders. The rear of the jersey also includes an embroidered Café du Cycliste Audax logo.

item.content:encoded:
Features:

item.title: Pale Yellow Mesh Short Sleeve Women’s Base Layer
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description:
Features:
  • Lightweight, highly-breathable, moisture wicking, quick drying performance fabric
  • Flatlock seams for high-comfort close to the skin fit
  • Anti-bacterial treatment applied to fabric
  • Made in Italy
item.content:encoded: Short sleeve mesh base layer for effective core temperature regulation when riding in warm conditions. Breathable, stretchy, and soft on the skin, the mesh fabric wicks moisture away from the body, regulating temperature and keeping the wearer comfortable on long days in the saddle.

item.title: Borsa Eco
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description: A simple, stylish, durable storage solution for your everyday riding essentials that use materials core to the cycling community.
item.content:encoded: The BORSA ECO combines all the premium material used in our on-bike seat packs with a little flair for portable storage. We designed the BORSA ECO for quick on or off bicycle access to your phone, keys, bank cards, money, and more. Made from recycled leather, the BORSA ECO is eco-friendly. The classic diamond design adds a dash of elegance.

item.title: Mist Ultralight Windproof Gilet
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description:
Highly packable, lightweight, windproof and water resistant cycling gilet.
Whether it’s a cold early start, a chilly mountain descent or just an additional layer for when you're out all day, our windproof gilet is a versatile outer layer for a wide range of temperatures and conditions.
item.content:encoded:
Features:

  • Ultralight, water and wind resistant performance recycled fabric
  • Total weight: 70 grams (size M)
  • YKK 2-way double zip
  • Zippable front stash pocket
  • Easily packs down into a jersey pocket
  • Stretchy mesh side panels for additional breathability and enhanced fit
  • Reflective details at sides and rear
  • Fabric – main 100% recycled nylon; mesh 73% recycled nylon, 27% recycled elastane
  • Made in Italy

item.title: Black Exceed Cycling Shoes
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description:
• The shoe size corresponding to your largest foot is the correct one.
  • In case of a length difference > 3mm, please contact to our customer service to consult how to select the correct size.
item.content:encoded:
Our EXCEED is a full-bred performance shoe showcasing superior fit, performance and comfort with its ultra-stiff carbon chassis and its full microfiber upper at 215 gram. An all-round product that exceeds the expectations of the uncompromising, ambitious rider.

 

Our proprietary ultra-stiff carbon sole is where all Nimbl shoes are built around. This system allows for optimal support of your entire foot. It furthermore provides superior stiffness to maximize power transfer, comfort and pedaling efficiency whilst keeping its weight at benchmark levels.

item.title: Olive Bio Water Bottle 500ml
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description:
Features:
  • Easy squeeze material
  • Screw on cap
  • Ergonomic design for added grip
  • 100% biodegradable
  •  BPA free
item.content:encoded: Cycling water bottle made using 100% biodegradable material.

item.title: Pro Edition Ultimate Cycling Shoes
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description: The basis of the Ultimate is our improved proprietary monocoque carbon chassis. The exposed carbon visibly underlines that the construction and assembly of our shoes is fundamentally different to all other mainstream brands.
item.content:encoded:
Unparalleled power transfer for all your explosive sprints and short, out of the saddle power bursts. In comparison to the EXCEED and AIR we have built in extra stiffness into the carbon fibre chassis. And we are not afraid to show it off – more exposed carbon fibre that highlights the unique handmade fabrication methods that are applied in the ULTIMATE.

Professionals ride over 30.000 kilometers per year hence the world tour peloton is the ultimate testing ground for high-end performance products. For the 2021 season Nimbl is the choice of over 25 world class athletes that have sought new levels of performance through their shoes. Greg van Avermaet, rider of the AG2R Citroën team is one of them. The Olympic champion is known to be demanding on his equipment and approached Nimbl to see whether we could jointly develop a new benchmark for power transfer, comfort and most importantly fit. The result of this development process: the ULTIMATE.

item.title: Burnt Orange Short Sleeve Men’s Jersey
item.dc:creator: user1
item.description: Lightweight short sleeve cycling jersey made using a high stretch, breathable, moisture wicking fabric. Designed for comfort and performance when riding in warm weather conditions.
item.content:encoded:
• Breathable, high-stretch, moisture wicking performance recycled fabric
  • YKK reverse coil camlock zip
  • Three rear pockets
  • Slim fit
  • Fabric – 84% recycled polyester, 16% elastane
  • Made in Italy
